string-array.name: data_summary
string-array.item: PewDiePie, born Felix Arvid Ulf Kjellberg on October 24, 1989, is a Swedish YouTuber...
MrBeast, whose real name is James Stephen Donaldson, is an American YouTuber born on May 7, 1998...
Markiplier, real name Mark Edward Fischbach, born June 28, 1989, is an American YouTuber...
SSSniperWolf, born Alia Shelesh on October 22, 1992, is a British-American YouTuber...
James Charles, born James Charles Dickinson on May 23, 1999, is an American beauty YouTuber...
Dude Perfect is an American sports and comedy group consisting of twins Cory and Coby Cotton, Garrett Hilbert, Cody Jones, and Tyler Toney...
Ninja, born Richard Tyler Blevins on June 5, 1991, is an American YouTuber and professional gamer...
David Dobrik, born July 23, 1996, is a Slovak-born American YouTuber and podcaster...
Liza Koshy, born March 31, 1996, is an American YouTuber, comedian, and actress...
Emma Chamberlain, born May 22, 2001, is an American YouTuber and social media personality known for her vlogs and lifestyle content...
Logan Paul, born April 1, 1995, is an American YouTuber, boxer, and entertainer known for his vlogs and social media presence...

string-array.name: data_description
string-array.item: pewdiepie, born felix arvid ulf kjellberg on october 24, 1989, is a swedish youtuber known for his lets play videos and comedic content.
mrbeast, whose real name is james stephen donaldson, is an american youtuber born on may 7, 1998, famous for his elaborate challenges and philanthropy.
markiplier, real name mark edward fischbach, born june 28, 1989, is an american youtuber recognized for his gaming videos and charity work.
sssniperwolf, born alia shelesh on october 22, 1992, is a british-american youtuber known for her reaction videos and gaming content.
james charles, born james charles dickinson on may 23, 1999, is an american beauty youtuber known for makeup tutorials and collaborations.
dude perfect is an american sports and comedy group consisting of twins cory and coby cotton, garrett hilbert, cody jones, and tyler toney, known for their trick shots and challenges.
ninja, born richard tyler blevins on june 5, 1991, is an american youtuber and professional gamer best known for his fortnite gameplay.
david dobrik, born july 23, 1996, is a slovak-born american youtuber and podcaster known for his vlogs featuring friends and celebrities.
liza koshy, born march 31, 1996, is an american youtuber, comedian, and actress known for her comedic skits and vlogs.
emma chamberlain, born may 22, 2001, is an american youtuber known for her vlogs, fashion, and lifestyle content, offering relatable and humorous content.
logan paul, born april 1, 1995, is an american youtuber, entertainer, and boxer known for his controversial vlogs, as well as his social media and combat sports career.
